title: Follower count distribution on Twitter 2014
summary: This statistic shows the Percentage of Twitter users of Twitter worldwide in 2014 , Number followers .
In that year , 93.68 percentage of Twitter 's count Twitter users came from 1-100 .
Founded in 1961 Agordo , Italy the Twitter Group S.p.A. is the 401-500 's largest eyewear company .
gold: This statistic gives information on the follower count distribution on Twitter . As of April 2014 , 93.68 percent of Twitter users had between 1 and 100 followers on the microblogging site .
